text: Use the environment that the mod_jk-1.2.28-httpd-2.2.3.so integrates apache 2.2.11 and tomcat 6.0.20, the nonsupport virtualhost, use mod_jk-1.2.18 to have no problem.
creator: wpmzyl@gmail.com
mturk@apache.org
text:
Since 1.2.26 you need to explicitly use the JkMountCopy for the same behavior.
See: http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/reference/apache.html

For further discussion use the Tomcat user list
